extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  Level 4 and (registration in a POLS major or medial plan) and POLS250 and (a GPA of 2.5 on all units in POLS).

basic.description: An examination of key issues in gender and politics. Topics will vary from year to year; consult the departmental homepage.
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Seminar in Women and Politics
